::Kluster/Prowl/Cybertronian Fire::

Prowl sighs as Iron Raptor turns away from him, a pained look coming into his 
eyes again. He steps back, turning his head to look at Quake as the lizard 
enters.

Prowl nearly jumps at Arcangel's voice over his comm, grabbing his gun when 
he hears that the Cybertronian Fire was under attack. He frowns. There was no 
shaking, and no sounds or fliquering lights, unlike at the Ark. He looks at 
Kluster.

"Are we under attack?"

Kluster nods, taking out his gun. "Let's go!"

The two Maximals run out of the room, heading for the exit.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Cybertronian Fire's computer acnouledges the attack, sicking the external 
defences on the attackers. Two missile launchers each fire a signature 
seeking missile at Dark Lord, the autoguns continue firing at all three 
attackers, and the laser batteries let loose a few shots at Grim Reaper and 
Rush.
